data.title: Courteney Cox 'dives into year' on birthday as Jennifer Aniston shares love
data.meta_description: Courteney Cox 'dives into next year' on birthday as Jennifer Aniston shares love.
data.text:
Courteney Cox has quite literally dived into the next year of her life, with Friends pal Jennifer Aniston sharing the love for the star on her 56th birthday.

The Monica Geller actress, who truly doesn’t look like she’s aged in years, cracked up fans as she shared a slow-mo video of herself not so gracefully diving into a pool to the soundtrack of New Radicals’ You Get What You Give.

‘Gracefully diving into this next year… #oaf,’ she wrote in the caption.

With fans and friends wishing her a happy birthday, Jennifer shared a string of sweet photos and messages for her former co-star.

‘Happy birthday to this amazing human,’ she wrote next to a gorgeous snap of Courteney, adding one of the pair of them and writing: ‘I love you, C.C.’

‘Sorry I’m late,’ she pointed out, next to a photo of Courteney looking less than impressed, and finishing up her messages with a Friends throwback (what else?!) and adding: ‘The end.’

Jen’s not the only Friends star to be sharing the love for Courteney, with Lisa Kudrow sharing a string of snaps of the actress.

‘Happy birthday @courteneycoxofficial my genius generous gorgeous grounded great good FRIEND I love you,’ the Phoebe Buffay actress wrote.

Name us a better trio, we dare you.

Elsewhere, the likes of Isla Fisher, Octavia Spencer, and Kate Hudson wished Courteney a happy birthday.

And the star’s birthday comes just a day after her daughter Coco’s, with the teenager turning 16 this week.

The Friends actress shared a sweet throwback clip of a young Coco whizzing around an ice rink to celebrate the occasion, writing: ‘Happy sweet 16th Cocolo. You’re my little quirk of the universe. I love you ♥️♥️♥️’.

Courteney is isolating with Coco in Los Angeles, while her boyfriend, Snow Patrol musician Johnny McDaid, quarantines in London.

The mother-daughter duo have been occupying their time by binge-watching Friends and belting out Demi Lovato covers.

The Cougar Town actress recently played the piano while Coco sang away to Demi’s hit Anyone in a video, putting us all to shame with their talent.

We wouldn’t have expected anything else from them, tbh.
